attributes.action: Pressure the United Nations to send troops to extract Robert Mugabe from Zimbabwe and charge him with crimes against humanity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Nations is the only way that Robert Mugabe can be removed from power in Zimbabwe, and I do not feel that Gordon Brown is doing as much as he could do to stop the murder which is on the brink of genocide in the country.

I call on the Prime Minister to pressure the UN to send their troops to withdraw Robert Mugabe and try him for crimes against humanity.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
